document_data.name: Raelrur's Run
document_data.ends: The nameless lane just inside the city wall
document_data.mainbody: '''Raelrur's Run''' was a side street in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|70}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 55: Khôltar, Part 6, Looking Around the Farrgaunlar}}
document_data.Descripton: Raelrur's Run began at the [[North Way]] very close to Farrgaunlar (the southern gate into Khôltar) and headed east until it reached the unnamed road just inside the wall that circled the city and connected all the guard towers.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|76}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 59: Khôltar, Part 10, Hungry in Handrornlar, and More}} Upon entering Farrgaunlar, [[Darvoro's Plates]] was the first building to the right (east), then came Raelrur's Run, and then [[Pauntraal]], the garthraun (police) headquarters and duty house. Turning down Raelrur's Run, there were guarded warehouses along most of its length until the last building on the left (north): [[Mother Talasko's]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
Locations on Raelrur's Run included:
* [[Mother Talasko's]]: A low-class blurdren (food counter) with good [[Shaar stew|stew]].
* [[Pauntraal]]: The garthraun HQ and guard tower for Farrgaunlar.
* [[Darvoro's Plates]]: A successful metal plate manufacturer.
